Unique business intelligence for
car dealerships in the US

Pulse scans millions of vehicle listings to analyze sales patterns and estimate average time on market and sale prices for any car configuration.

Dealers can easily identify high demand vehicle configurations to cut sales cycles

  • Describe any segment with parameters like: make, model, fuel type, location, features and others.

  • Instantly see how long matching ads are staying on the marketplace with average sale prices.

  • Fine-tune lookups and compare results to discover fast selling combinations.

Michael Leterson
 Owner, Formative Cars
